Body:
emg1 = nk.emg_simulate(duration=20, length=5000, burst_number=1)
assert len(emg1) == 5000
emg2 = nk.emg_simulate(duration=20, length=5000, burst_number=15)
assert scipy.stats.median_absolute_deviation(emg1
    ) < scipy.stats.median_absolute_deviation(emg2)
emg3 = nk.emg_simulate(duration=20, length=5000, burst_number=1,
    burst_duration=2.0)
assert len(nk.signal_findpeaks(emg3, height_min=1.0)['Peaks']) > len(nk.
    signal_findpeaks(emg1, height_min=1.0)['Peaks'])
